author: knut
msg: Removed dependency on RegistryAssembly from DescriptorParser. The DescriptorParser does now instead just
set the schema ids on ConfigurationPointDescriptors and ServicePointDescriptors. The "schema linking" is now
performed at registry construction time rather than at the module parsing stage. As a result the RegistryAssembly
is now only used to check module dependencies and the SchemaInjector is no longer required.

author: knut
msg: spotted this typo as I wrote the Groovy example :-)

author: knut
msg: added support for defining module descriptors using Groovy scripts

author: knut
msg: refactored constructor autowiring in BuilderFactory to reuse BuilderFacets

author: hlship
msg: HIVEMIND-77: Report real exceptoin in BuilderFactoryLogic, not the wrapping InvocationTargetException.
